programme.title: Bullet Teen
programme.desc: Empat remaja hidup di pinggir kerana usia dewasa semakin hampir. Orang buangan, bekas banduan, penagih dadah dan wanita yang trauma berkumpul untuk mengharungi keperitan hidup dan mencari tujuan dalam dunia yang menyakitkan.

programme.title: You Saka..Pergi Jauh-jauh S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Episod ke 6 ini memaparkan antara lain Adrus dinasihati oleh Ibrahim agar mencari kerja. Sementara itu dia agak kurang ceria kerana Nia tidak berhubung langsung dengannya akhir-akhir ini, lalu menceritakan kepada Shasa. Shasa pula menceritakan masalah itu kepada Nia. Zeti yang merajuk kerana Ibrahim tidak mahu pakatannya untuk memisahkan Nia dengan Adrus telah menemui bomoh lain dan mendapatkan cara untuk memikat Ibrahim, lalu mengadakan janji temu dengan Ibrahim dan semasa inilah dia sempat memalitkan minyak pengasih. Dalam pada itu, Zeti berjaya mempengaruhi Datin Salina dengan upah RM 50,000 dan akan berusaha memulih Fauzah untuk menjayakan hasrat Datin Salina tercapai. Akhir-akhir ini Ibrahim telah terpikat dan sanggup bersama Zeti hingga lewat malam tetapi masih bersandarkan alasan keluar mengubati pelanggan kepada isteri dan anaknya. Dalam masa yang sama Adrus yang cuba menperjelaskan tentang masalah persahabatan mereka yang retak, tidak mahu didengari Nia.

programme.title: Hikayat Merong Mahawangsa
programme.desc: Pada tahun 120, Empayar Rom ketika itu di bawah pemerintahan Hadrian sementara di negara China, Dinasti Han merupakan sebuah empayar yang kuat dan telah memperluaskan pemerintahannya ke negara Asia Tengah. Semasa angkatan Rom sedang membaik pulih kapal mereka di Goa, mereka meminta pertolongan Merong Mahawangsa mengiringi Putera Rom ke Langkasuka (dikatakan terletak di utara Malaysia) untuk berkahwin dengan seorang Puteri China yang cantik dari Dinasti Han.

programme.title: Mantera Anjasmoro Ep7
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan keadaan Suria semakin teruk dan bertindak ganas seperti dirasuk hantu. Zahid juga jarang datang menengok Suria. Bomoh wanita yang membuat santau untuk Suria juga mati dalam keadaan ngeri. Bapa meminta bantuan Ustaz Ibrahim, dalam perjalanan untuk membantu Suria, uztas pula terkorban dalam kemalangan jalanraya. Seterusnya, Suria pula mati di hospital dalam keadaan ngeri.

programme.title: The Presence
programme.desc: Aom dihantui mimpi ngeri yang tidak dapat dijelaskan. Semasa melawat neneknya, dia mendapat tahu bahawa neneknya yang kelihatan lebih mati daripada hidup sedang melayan dan memberi makan kepada hantu. Adakah Aom akan menerima nasibnya?

programme.title: Azem 4
programme.desc: Ilmu hitam yang canggih telah dihasilkan oleh seorang syeikh yang jahat dan seorang ibu yang balik dari menziarahi anak dan isterinya. Tujuan ilmu hitam itu tidak ketara tetapi ia berakhir dengan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh isteri terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kisah bermula pada satu malam apabila SARAKIT mengalami mimpi yang menakutkan. Dalam mimpinya itu, satu LEMBAGA PEREMPUAN yang berlumuran dengan darah muncul di hadapan SARAKIT sambil meminta tolong. SARAKIT menghampiri LEMBAGA tersebut. Tiba-tiba LEMBAGA itu bertukar wajah menjadi perempuan yang berwajah hodoh dan menakutkan. LEMBAGA itu mengejar SARAKIT. SARAKIT tersedar dari tidurnya apabila dia dikejutkan oleh RAFIQ. Dalam waktu yang sama, bomoh yang diupah oleh PN MARIAM sedang berusaha untuk memisahkan antara SARAKIT dengan RAFIQ. Bomoh itu berpuas hati setelah usahanya selesai.

programme.title: Dorm
programme.desc: Ton (Chalee Trairat) ialah seorang budak lelaki Thai yang dihantar oleh bapanya (Suttipong Tudpitakkul) ke sekolah berasrama penuh untuk mendapatkan pendidikan yang lebih teratur. Setiba di sana, rakan sekolahnya mengusiknya dengan cerita hantu yang menakutkan tentang seorang budak lelaki yang lemas di kolam renang, dan seorang gadis yang membunuh diri. Ton sukar untuk menumpukan perhatian di sekolah kerana rakan sekelasnya yang baru, tetapi tidak lama kemudian dia berkawan dengan Vichien (Siranath Jianthavorn) bahawa kawan barunya ialah budak lelaki yang lemas.

programme.title: Bodyguard S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Farish, Ryan dan Bakri masuk ke lokasi pemprosesan dadah kumpulan Samad. Mereka berjaya menumpaskan kumpulan tersebut. Tahir, selepas mendengar kesalahan yang dilakukan oleh adiknya Samad terpkasa melepaskan Haris dan Anuar dari kawalannya. Farish pula cuba menyelamatkan Kasandra dari tawanan Mazlan, dia berjaya membawa Kasandra keluar setelah helahnya menyamar sebagai peminat Kasandra telah membuat Mazlan tertipu. Dalam kes berasingan, Bakri sebagai bodyguard kepada Eira diminta berpura-pura menjadi teman lelaki Eira semasa mereka balik di kampung untuk berjumpa ibunya. Hakim pula telah menawan Yasmin dan pengurus pusat peranginan, Danial cuba mengesan kedudukan Yasmin dan Hakim.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep13
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah Sohot telah diberi amaran oleh Hariman agar beliau berdiam diri sahaja semasa mencari buloh nanti. Sohot telah berjaya mengambil batu ajaib dari Zara tetapi secara tibatiba batu ajaib telah diambil oleh jin bernama Rakib, tanpa pengetahuannya dan ditukarkan menjadi gula-gula. Sohot membuat layang-layang untuk Zara sementara Salim membuat layang-layang untuk Haikal untuk mengambil hati kedua-dua budak tersebut. Johan terlihat Suraya bersama-sama Cikgu Razif dan anaknya makan di sebuah restoran lalu membuat hatinya resah gelisah serta cemburu. Sementara itu Hariman sibuk hendak mencari batu permata sehingga sanggup hendak berjumpa dengan bomoh. Jin Rakib telah menyamar menjadi seorang bomoh lalu menipu Hariman dan juga Salim apabila mereka mendapat satu bungkusan yang diperkatakan oleh bomoh tersebut bahawa didalamnya ada batu permata tetapi setelah dibuka didapati hanya gula-gula dalam bungkusan tersebut. Bomoh tersebut ghaib begitu sahaja dan menjadikan Hariman bertambah geram dan marah.

programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam seorang pemuda yang perlu menghadapi masyarakat selepas 17 tahun menjalani hukuman akibat melakukan rompakan di sebuah bank. Tetapi masyarakat kampung nyata tidak mudah menerima seorang bekas banduan. Bukan itu sahaja, bekas isterinya Tipah yang kini telah berkahwin dengan Musa seorang guru silat tidak dapat menerimanya. Kecuali Pak Itam dan isterinya sahaja yang bersimpati, Azam harus menghadapi pelbagai tohmahan dan penghinaan daripada orang kampung.

programme.title: Iskandar
programme.desc: Karl Iskandar baru sahaja kembali ke tanah air untuk mengambil alih perniagaan ayahnya. Kepulangannya itu telah membongkar satu komplot pembunuhan seorang jutawan yang dirancang oleh Ringgo, seorang ketua gangster di Kuala Lumpur. Namun, di sebalik komplot pembunuhan tersebut Iskandar telah menemui satu kebenaran yang amat menyedihkan.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Iskandar
programme.desc: Karl Iskandar baru sahaja kembali ke tanah air untuk mengambil alih perniagaan ayahnya. Kepulangannya itu telah membongkar satu komplot pembunuhan seorang jutawan yang dirancang oleh Ringgo, seorang ketua gangster di Kuala Lumpur. Namun, di sebalik komplot pembunuhan tersebut Iskandar telah menemui satu kebenaran yang amat menyedihkan.

programme.title: Nafas Cinta
programme.desc: Amir berkelana ke Pulau Bayu untuk menenangkan fikirannya setelah kontrak muziknya dibatalkan. Di sana Amir terpesona dengan kemerduan suara Suria ketika membaca Al Quran. Setelah itu, hubungan Amir dan Suria menjadi semakin rapat. Suria tinggal bersama neneknya yang menghidap penyakit ketumbuhan. Amir membawa Suria dan neneknya ke bandar untuk mendapatkan rawatan serta ingin mengembangkan bakat Suria untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri merupakan seorang bekas banduan yang ingin memulakan hidup baru bersama keluarganya. Namun, nasib tidak menyebelahinya apabila dia diburu kumpulan yang diketuai Ramon. Adik Zamri, Awie ialah seorang penyanyi kumpulan rock popular yang sedang menjalinkan hubungan cinta bersama Ella, yang juga penyanyi rock. Sesuatu terjadi yang menyebabkan Awie dan Ella putus hubungan. Manakala, Zamri pula diuji dengan pelbagai dugaan apabila isterinya dibunuh dengan kejam.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Diculik geng, Maria sanggup menaruhkan nyawa demi menyelamatkan Mariana.

programme.title: Bara
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Soal Hati
programme.desc: Daniel ialah seorang lelaki yang mempunyai segala-galanya. Dia jatuh cinta pandang pertama dengan Nurul Ain, seorang gadis kampung yang bekerja menjadi jurujual. Daniel berusaha untuk memikat Nurul Ain dengan berpura-pura menjadi seorang lelaki bernama Ahmad. Dalam masa yang sama bapa saudara Nurul Ain yang mempunyai masalah kewangan ingin menjodohkannya dengan seorang duda kaya.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Puteri Megawati, puteri mahkota negara Inderapuri yang mengalami kecederaan dalam satu kemalangan jalanraya telah diselamatkan oleh Hakimi. Semasa meninggalkan tempat kemalangan itu, Hakimi secara tidak sengaja tercicir sebelah kasut yang dipinjam daripada sahabatnya, Kumin. Oleh kerana berasa terhutang budi kepada penyelamatnya, Puteri Megawati meminta pertolongan seorang wartawan untuk mencari “Mr Cinderella” yang menyelamatkannya dengan ganjaran lumayan.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Azizah The Lagend
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Motif
programme.desc: Dewi seorang polis penyiasat telah terlibat dalam satu kes penculikan di luar bandar.dalam pada masa yang sama dewi bergelut dengan perasaan sebagai isteri kedua.

programme.title: Sepet
programme.desc: percintaan antara seorang pemuda Cina dengan seorang gadis Melayu yang baru sahaja tamat sekolah menengah. Perkataan sepet itu sendiri bermaksud mata yang bersaiz kecil atau kuyu dan biasanya dirujuk kepada bangsa Cina kerana rupa bentuk mata mereka yang sepet.

programme.title: Tmo Aku Pilih Kamu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Aku Pilih Kamu

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Danau Hitam
programme.desc: Selepas 5 rakan menemui peti misteri di tasik, mimpi dan ketakutan mula menghantui mereka.

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pak Tam Duda
programme.desc: seorang duda dan usahawan yang berjaya di dalam kampungnya . Dia juga dihormati oleh orang-orang kampung kerana kebaikan dan kemurahan hatinya . muncul seorang gadis bandar serta teman lelakinya yang mempunyai niat jahat untuk menggoda dan mengikis segala wang dan harta lelaki itu.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: seorang penghulu yang gila kuasa memerintah di satu daerah cuba meluaskan jajahan takluknya dengan menakluki daerah-daerah berjiran . Usaha-usahanya itu mendapat tentangan dari daerah tetangga sehingga berlaku pertumpahan darah

programme.title: Talk Back And You'Re Dead
programme.desc: Samantha, seorang gadis comel yang jatuh cinta dengan seorang ketua gangster yang bernama Top.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13 Ep5
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai sebuah hotel untuk menjana wang.

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: seorang lelaki membawa keluarganya berpindah rumah di sebuah taman perumahan . Kehadiran mereka di situ tidak dikenali oleh orang-orang yang berada disekelilingnya kerana sikap sombong dan mementingkan diri . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja tidak mengambil tahu hal jirannya malah melarang isteri dan anaknya bergaul dengan mereka

programme.title: Danau Hitam
programme.desc: Selepas 5 rakan menemui peti misteri di tasik, mimpi dan ketakutan mula menghantui mereka.

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Fist Of Stardom
programme.desc: thongpoon, seorang pemuda yang suke bertengkar. Mengebara ke ibu kota untuk mengejar impian ingin menjadi pahlawan.

programme.title: Sepet
programme.desc: percintaan antara seorang pemuda Cina dengan seorang gadis Melayu yang baru sahaja tamat sekolah menengah. Perkataan sepet itu sendiri bermaksud mata yang bersaiz kecil atau kuyu dan biasanya dirujuk kepada bangsa Cina kerana rupa bentuk mata mereka yang sepet.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga

programme.title: Mak, Adib Pulang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adib seorang anak yatim piatu, diambil oleh sebuah keluarga dan dijadikan anak angkat. Adib merasakan dia telah mengkhianati ibunya sehingga menyebabkan dia lari balik ke rumah ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep116
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Rumahku Istanaku Ep3
programme.desc: Program realiti pertama di Indonesia yang berani menghadiahkan 1 unit rumah dan wang tunai untuk setiap episod.

programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta Ep3
programme.desc: Untuk memastikan rancangannya berjalan lancar, Chandra mendekati ramai janda kaya untuk menggunakan kekayaan mereka. Itulah yang dirasakan oleh Tiwi. programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep93
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Wajik Lebaran dan Tangisan Ibu
programme.desc: Profesion Puan Farida ialah penjual kuih tradisional. Dia tinggal bersama anak sulungnya, Bahar, yang merupakan seorang mekanik. Bahar memerlukan wang untuk rawatan perubatan ibunya kerana dia sakit kepala. Bagaimanapun, Bahar telah dipecat oleh bosnya, Encik Nasron. Oleh kerana Bahar tidak mampu membayar rawatan perubatan, dia membawa ibunya pulang. Malangnya, rumah mereka dirampas.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep21
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Mudik Lebaran Terakhir Untuk Ibu
programme.desc: Siti bersusah payah mencari wang untuk keluarganya. Malangnya, bosnya tidak membenarkan Siti berkomunikasi dengan keluarganya, dan dia terpaksa menghilangkan diri tanpa berkata apa-apa. Pada suatu hari, Siti dibebaskan oleh bosnya dan dia pulang untuk melawat ibu dan adiknya. Bagaimanapun, dia mendapati kedua-duanya sudah tidak hidup lagi.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep22
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed Ep2
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep18
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the China–North Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: An Old Lady
programme.desc: A 69-year-old woman was raped by a 29-year-old male nurse. Taking the courage to report to the police, people questioned the credibility of her claim. Could she protects her dignity?

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: The Battle: Roar To Victory
programme.desc: In 1920, a fierce battle takes place between the Korean independence militias and imperialist Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: The Book Of Fish
programme.desc: Joseon scholar Chung Yak-jeon was exiled during the 1801 Catholic Persecution. He met a fisherman and decided to exchange knowledge with him in writing the book of fish.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: Amid the time of Korean War, a young boy's vow to take care of his family marked the beginning of a lifelong promise spanning 60 years.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman who gets tired of her difficult life in the city returns to her rural hometown. There, she meets her childhood friends and heals her emotional wounds.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Homme Fatale
programme.desc: A lovely young man becomes the first male gisaeng in Joseon to help his mother’s failing business. Until one day, a flower-like woman walks into his life and changes everything…

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: BOYS PLANET Ep10
programme.desc: As a K-pop boy group audition project decided and produced only by Korean and global fans, <BOYS PLANET> presents the potential of boys from all around the world.

programme.title: The Genius Paik Ep2
programme.desc: Will Paik Jong-won be able to successfully run a restaurant overseas? With the help of Lee Jang-woo, BamBam, Yuri and John Park, he will start his business in the barren land of K-food – Africa and Italy.

programme.desc: Continuing the pattern of last season, a group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to live in an apartment for one month. Guests like Michelle Chen, Hito Du, Bridgette Qiao, Orfila Wu, Ava Wang, etc. will observe the whole process the occurrence of love for these few couples.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. Xie Nan, Jiang Changjian, and Wei Kunlin (Dr. Wei) were formed as a guardian group, together with Ding Ruoxu, Leo Li, Jay Song, etc. who jointly escort the players on the "Ling-guang Island Tour".

programme.title: Strawberryman Ep5
programme.desc: Breaking the traditional mode of music variety show, around 24 groups of rock bands, folk bands, hip-hop, electronic and other styles of musicians are invited to perform in an outdoor concert and become a member of Strawberryman. The guests include Jam Hsiao, GAI, and Zhang Ya Dong.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45934594
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10331034
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1803
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45934594
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1803
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3586
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2614
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3586
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45944595
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10351036
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2022
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep390
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: 41st Hong Kong Film Awards Red Carpet, The
programme.desc: Stars and celebrities hit the red carpet ahead of the Awards Ceremony, showing off their best and brightest looks for one of Hong Kong’s biggest nights. Follow our live coverage as the superstars deliver their glamourous styles!

programme.title: The 41st Hong Kong Film Awards
programme.desc: The 41st Hong Kong Film Awards returns in a big way after a three-year absence due to the coronavirus outbreak in Hong Kong. We proudly brings you the live coverage of this much anticipated awards ceremony. Stay tuned and support Hong Kong films!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam’s empire.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the “Tsai Li Fu” style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong’s enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhanam, Shritha Sivadas, Rajendran, T.M. Karthik Srinivasan, Kavitha Ranjini

programme.title: Mo
programme.desc: Tamil horror comedy film, Suresh Ravi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Ramesh Thilak, and Darbuka Siva

programme.title: Shivalinga

programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: The film tells the stories of different people and how they are intertwined surrounding the gruesome death of a man who got thrown out of a window.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Girl On A Bicycle
programme.desc: Paolo, an Italian in Paris, has just proposed to his German girlfriend when he bumps into a pretty French girl. Smitten, Paolo took some bad advice from a friend and finds his life upside-down with a German fiancée, a French "wife" and two Aussie kids.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Dying To Defrost
programme.desc: This poor vampire has lived through the centuries, freezing down to the marrow! She’s at the end of her tether and she’s had enough. She’s going to do whatever it takes to feel the warmth on her skin, or it’ll be the death of her, AGAIN!!

programme.title: Bunny Kicks
programme.desc: A rabbit couple unexpectedly have a kitten and they struggle to raise her amongst their rabbit-only community.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 14
programme.desc: Sean tows a mysterious trailer to the auction and everyone wonders what's inside. T Money and Papa Bear battle over bins while Brandon and Lori play different kinds of games.

programme.title: Friends S9 6
programme.desc: In the Emmy Award-winning comedy's 200th episode, Ross jealously mocks Rachel's choice of an oversensitive male nanny, Sandy (FREDDIE PRINZE, JR. - "I Know What You Did Last Summer"), for Emma.

programme.title: Friends S9 7
programme.desc: When Chandler's former romantic rival intends to sell his apartment. The guys are aghast to discover an old videotape that might feature Monica having sex with her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Friends S9 8
programme.desc: On the night before Thanksgiving, Rachel's self-centered younger sister, Amy (CHRISTINA APPLEGATE - "Jesse," "Married... With Children"), ruins everyone's holiday dinner with her uncensored observations.

programme.title: Friends S9 9
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe go out for a night together. After Rachel impulsively gives a handsome restaurant patron her telephone number, she worries that he'll call when Ross is in their apartment.

programme.title: Friends S9 10
programme.desc: Chandler must remain in Tulsa during Christmas time because of a big deadline at work. Monica suspects the worst when she discovers that he will be joined by a beautiful co-worker, Wendy (SELMA BLAIR).

programme.title: Gotham S1 14
programme.desc: While Gordon and Bullock hunt down a killer who targets victims with severe phobias, Fish Mooney reveals a secret of Oswald’s, prompting Maroni (DAVID ZAYAS) to test his loyalty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 17
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr spin a wheel and creep out shoppers at the mall. Then, the guys get what they deserve at a coffee shop, and it all leads to an impromptu punishment that leaves one Joker soaked, enraged and totally shocked.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 18
programme.desc: The guys dress to the nines, but act like zeroes while trying to get sympathy for their problems. Then, a video game focus group goes off the rails, and the big loser faces the music in a tone-deaf punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 19
programme.desc: The guys ask strangers for a little help with big items at the grocery store and give entrepreneurial tips to some unfortunate souls. Plus, the big loser strikes out at a little league softball game while posing as "that dad".

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 20
programme.desc: The guys shock shoppers by going footloose and fancy-free in a discount store, then pose insane questions to strangers in the park. And the big loser is taken for a wild ride in a tricked-out wheelchair he can't possibly control.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 21
programme.desc: The guys make a mockery of each other as restaurant managers, name that (made up) tune with strangers, and then head to the park for some awkward fun in the sun. Plus, the big loser gets wrapped up in a birthday surprise.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 7
programme.desc: After Beth makes a major discovery on The Gambler’s laptop, the team moves forward with a risky plan. Jennie returns and seeks help from Courtney.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 06
programme.desc: When Howard dresses up as Sheldon for Halloween, Sheldon seeks retaliation; Meanwhile Penny doesn't remember her first kiss with Leonard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 07
programme.desc: Leonard regrets his newfound authority at work when he's responsible to distributing grant money; And Bernadette turns the playhouse into her hideaway.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 17
programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiancée, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber Of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway musical, Sweeney Todd, played by Johnny Depp, opens a barber shop to obtain revenge on those who sent him to prison on false charges.

programme.desc: Superman & Lois S3 5

programme.desc: In this first episode, Samira journeys to places rarely seen by western audiences to reveal how the Persian Empire was born, the mysterious writing of its early people and how Iran's powerful kings built a vast empire that became the envy of the ancient world.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into food factories. Today we see the production of hot sauce, lemon Italian ice and packed peanuts.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep22
programme.desc: A look at the production of food in the our food factories. This episode looks at the factories producing mustard, wafer biscuits, teriyaki sauce and coconut macaroons.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Masterminds - Using innovative techniques, Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brainpower.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Emptiness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories. This episode looks at factories producing cola, pickled beetroot, swiss rolls and yoghurt.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: Robson and Jim's Icelandic Fly Fishing Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Time is running out for actors Robson Green and Jim Murray as their time in Iceland is coming to a close.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep6
programme.desc: Oxfordshire - Ben is closer to home than he's ever been in rural Oxfordshire where he spends the week with a multi-generational family, who surrendered their conventional life.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Cape Cod and Niagara - Extreme Atlantic Coast - Robson travels up the Eastern seaboard from Boston to Niagara and finds blue fin tuna, lobster, striped bass, blue fish, steelhead and spiny dogfish.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Savannah Life - The Savannah is a complex web of life, from the plants at the bottom of the food chain to the predators at the top. Stories of life and death have unfolded on these plains for millions of years.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Springbok & Impala: Life in the Herd - From the dry deserts of the west to the moist savannas of the east, these two species are pivotal in the success of both plants and animals living across this divide.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1

programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankind’s effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living… on the “living beach”?

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Fires of Pele - The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.
