programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Packs - Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the park’s edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Close Encounter - Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Weka’s pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Humpback Birth of a Giant - Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whale’s life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Packs - Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the park’s edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where it’s mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Dingo - This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep5
programme.desc: A Pangolin's Plight - Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amanda’s risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who’s headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Remote Hideaways - In Jordan we find out what it's like to stay deep in the desert sleeping underneath the stars at the Bubble Luxotel Wadi Rum resort - a remote and unusual series of transparent "bubble" tents which look more like a cluster of space craft on Mars. In Norfolk, England, we visit an unusual two hundred year old building, known as Cley Windmill.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep5
programme.desc: In Derbyshire, Mike and Sarah set out to build a multigenerational longhouse. But with a complicated roof, a shortage of materials and an unexpected bereavement, it proves far from easy...

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep6
programme.desc: Club Med - Xavier wants to go undercover in two of Club Med's top performing resorts and find out what's working and what's not. He'll meet an assistant bar manager, a nurse, a chef and an events manager.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: This week Donal Skehan prepares quick fix food. He makes a Southern Fried Chicken Salad with a Lemon Curd Pudding for dessert. He also makes a Vodka Penne Pork Ragu.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Scotland - In Scotland, Nadiya is shown by a local forager how wild herbs have all the flavour and spice to create a Scottish curry, and mills her own flour.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Celebration Meal - Jamie makes an incredible celebration meal of rainbow tomato crostini and an epic slow-roasted lamb shoulder, finished off with strawberry panna cottas and mango caipirinhas.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Rick Stein's journey of discovery brings him to the sunnier climes of the Mediterranean, where he explores the French-Catalan legacy of Roussilon on the foothills of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Arora-Anand Family - Preeti and Sanjeev struggle with their hectic work lives and their children's multiple meal demands, causing spiralling food bills and waste. Can Prue and Rupy's plan tickle everyone's taste buds?

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Bread - The bakers will get stuck into baking breads today.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Donal and Max go back home to the fair city of Dublin. A city steeped in tradition, innovation, culture, craic and culinary delights.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep5
programme.desc: In Derbyshire, Mike and Sarah set out to build a multigenerational longhouse. But with a complicated roof, a shortage of materials and an unexpected bereavement, it proves far from easy...

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S8) Ep6
programme.desc: Music Week brings a pattern for a parka once loved by the Mods, old denim gets the country music treatment, and David Bowie inspires the sewers for their Made to Measure outfits.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Rick Stein's journey of discovery brings him to the sunnier climes of the Mediterranean, where he explores the French-Catalan legacy of Roussilon on the foothills of the Pyrenees.

programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brian’s untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers – to get them out of town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.desc: Cat’s in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Pockets - Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Cabbage Monster - When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Boomy Thunder - Theres a storm in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but noone is sure what the loud thumps coming from the sky are. Raa Raa sets off to find out.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Rainy Stick - Raa Raa is intrigued when he hears a whooshy rainy noise but its not raining. Following the sound he discovers Ooo Ooo with a rainy stick his favourite thing

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Phone - When their jungle phone breaks Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo lose contact and Raa Raa thinks Ooo Ooo doesnt want to be friends any more. Luckily Topsy is able to help them find each other again.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Zippy Zipwire - Zebby is too scared to go down the zipwire and everyone chanting loudly at her makes matters worse. Raa Raa realises the noise is putting her off and if everyone is quiet it might help Zebby.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed… will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep1
programme.desc: Fang Decay / Scare Day - Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep63
programme.desc: Remember Me Not - An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum's The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia… serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep37
programme.desc: The Tooth Pirate / Zups - When Archibald loses his last baby tooth, he wants to hold onto it forever. But in a bizarre dream, the dastardly Tooth Pirate steals it and Archibald must set out on a high seas adventure to get it back. / Archibald and Sage go door-to-door selling specialty ketchups for a Rooster Ranger Fundraiser.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep11
programme.desc: Elder Skelter / A More Perfect Reunion - Audrey is in for more than she expected after taking over the Elder position. Dot’s preschool reunion, pushes her to look more accomplished than her old rival.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.desc: Two Twigs/Fresh Coat of Pain - The Mighty Ones can't tell the difference between Twig and a random stick bug. / Rocksy sees fresh coat of paint spilled all over and becomes obsessed with trying to freshen up the yard.

programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Space Rocket - Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Smartysaurus's Jet Pack - Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Topsy Turvy Trees - All is set for the Toy Green Picnic until Noddy finds some of the trees turned upside down! Was it the Ninjas climbing on them? Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Story - Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jangly Jungle Band - Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: CoComelon - Love is all around! (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: In Cocomelon, baby JJ and his siblings go on fun every-day adventures with nursery, play, exploration and learning - situations which any pre-schooler could relate to. Fun, relatable stories set to toe-tapping songs.

programme.title: A Great Day With Gecko and Weasel! (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Laugh and learn with Gecko and the mechanicals at Gecko's Garage.

programme.title: Go Buster - Exciting Adventures (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: The curious six-year-old Buster is a friendly and eager-to-learn yellow bus who takes on new adventures.

programme.title: The Sharksons - Underwater Songs (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the Sharksons - an adorable family of sharks who love to sing, explore, dance and play.

programme.title: Its Time for Bed By Little Baby Bum (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is a fun and educational show for kids featuring classic and new nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Digley and Dazey - Summer Fun (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Best friends Digley and Dazey are part of a crack construction team, who go around building and fixing things in need of repair. Working hard as a team and using their creativity, they always save the day and learn new things along the way.

programme.title: Insectibles - Welcome to the Nuthouse (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of a young boy - Zak, his grandfather, Gramps, and three bio-mechanically enhanced insects as they search to find pieces of the ‘Shrinkinator’ - the crazy invention that shrunk Zak & Gramps before it exploded.

programme.title: Insectibles - The Rules of Attraction (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of a young boy - Zak, his grandfather, Gramps, and three bio-mechanically enhanced insects as they search to find pieces of the ‘Shrinkinator’ - the crazy invention that shrunk Zak & Gramps before it exploded.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep327
programme.desc: The Puppy and the Ring - In the mythical land of Bubbledom, the evil Night Wizard has taken the magical Ring of the Sun! Someone needs to save the daytime! Will Molly and Gil return the Ring to the Sun King, or will it be nighttime in Bubbledom forever?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud/Rainbow Comet Rush - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep920
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid - The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep919
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle - When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep918
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race - The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt/Deer Ball - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Good Steel bad Steel - What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Zooli's New Pet! - Excited that Zooli is getting a new pet, the Guppies try to guess what kind of animal it is! Zooli loves many creatures, so her new pet could be anything in the animal kingdom. Will they guess the right one before it arrives?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep920
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid - The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep919
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle - When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep918
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race - The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Game Over/Forever Young - Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Monday Funday - The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Lady Monkey mech - Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington and the Party - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Bicycles - Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Trouble in Harmony Valley! - Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Meet Josh! - Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sidekick Switcheroo - During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Monday Funday - The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8

programme.desc: Waitomo Glowworm Caves, New Zealand - It's not a good day to be a glow-worm, when Grandmaster Glitch goes in search of some disco sparkles in New Zealand. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep20

programme.desc: Coat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'coat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see all different types of coat - a snowy coat, a glowy coat and even a goat in a coat!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep11

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Flower Power - Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Am Inventing A Usefullish Invention - Charlie and Marv have to come up with an invention for a school project by tomorrow. Will Lola's ideas be welcomed by the pair?

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: New River - It hasn't rained in ages, Nelly and Nora find a thirsty flower that needs water.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep5

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep9

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep10

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep10
programme.desc: Percy and the Calliope - Percy tries to fix an old calliope so that it isn't scrapped.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep11

programme.desc: Evil Pea Takes a Break - The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong, resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the Bath Product's Aisle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep11

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep42

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals (S1) Ep5

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep11
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News Ep31
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep14
programme.desc: Paul Kennedy and the panel Caroline Wilson, Ryan Hoffman and Corbin Middlemas discuss the AFL's Gather Round in Adelaide, the latest NRL news and the Matildas' big win over England.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep30
programme.desc: The Hawthorn Hawks take on the GWS Giants at Norwood Oval in SA as part of the AFL's first ever Gather Round - with all teams and matches in Round 5 played in South Australia in a unique Festival of Football.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep31
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: In Conversation with Sachin Tendulkar
programme.desc: A masterclass with the Little Master. Paul Kennedy travelled to India for an exclusive one-on-one conversation with Sachin Tendulkar, where he talked about his batting technique, aggression, focus and deep love of cricket.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep31
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso arrives in the Kaywalagal region, travelling to the island of Masig to cook an array of fish dishes and discuss the importance of traditional language and being on Country.

programme.title: Miriam Margolyes: Australia Unmasked Ep1
programme.desc: Sr.1 - Starting in Tasmania, Miriam Margolyes is confronted with the complexities of Tasmania's rich history. She navigates these confronting themes all while meeting those still fighting for a 'fair go'.

programme.title: Restoration Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.2 - Dale and Michael embark on a project to restore two 19th Century timber cottages on their Tasmanian rural property. Will they accomplish their dream?

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep6
programme.desc: Sr.1 - With the goal of opening a health retreat in the Blue Mountains, David and Nicole are seeking the right property. It's a big ask, but presenter Jane Hall has a few surprises up her sleeve for the couple.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep7
programme.desc: Mick O'Dowd has survived the unimaginable. He came close to death but lived. Three years after first telling his story, Mick is reclaiming his life and is back doing the things he loves.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep8
programme.desc: Sr.9 - Heather Ewart hitches a ride with singer-songwriter Josh Arnold across western Queensland. On a Musical Road Trip they make stars of local kids, teaching them how to celebrate their community by writing their own town anthem.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep31
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Landline Ep10
programme.desc: The renewable energy rush dividing rural communities; Draining the silent flood of salinity in the wheat belt; Raking cockles in Shark Bay; and reviving Rawlinna: the largest sheep station in the country.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep31
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Insiders Ep10
programme.desc: David Speers is joined by Jack Latimore, Karen Middleton and Clare Armstrong to discuss the Indigenous Voice to Parliament referendum, Julian Leeser quits the Opposition frontbench, aged care, plus the state of the economy.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep14

programme.title: Easy Japanese Ep6022

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep907MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: The first champion from Mexico, Brandon Moreno, continues his rivalry with former flyweight champion Deiveson Figueiredo as they meet for a third time for the 125-pound belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their battle at UFC 270.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson
programme.desc: UFC 279 was headlined by a bout between two UFC legends and Ultimate Fighter winners: Nate Diaz and Tony “El Cucuy” Ferguson. Plus, Khamzat Chimaev faced rival Kevin Holland. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep24
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and UFC vet Leon “Rocky” Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2305
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Car and bike races have been held on closed public roads in the area around the town of Chemnitz, Germany since the 1920s and were still taking place until as recently as 1990. It was decided, however, that the five mile course through such a densely populated area was no longer suitable and a new circuit was built five miles west of Chemnitz in 1996. Although mainly used as a driver training centre and road transport safety station, Sachsenring first hosted MotoGP in 1998 and many improvements have taken place since then, including a drastic layout enhancement in 2001. Numerous tight corners make it one of the slower tracks on the calendar but there is never any shortage of close racing action.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2305
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Prelims - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Main Event - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.
